title: Guitar - Rhythmic Music Loops
description: A collection of rhythmic guitar loops including 40 musical sketches, containing acoustic, bass and heavy guitars that are perfect for backgrounds and dynamic action scenes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview 1: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/guitar-rhythmic-music-loops

Audio Preview 2: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/heavy-guitar-rhythmic-music-loops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xs8ngjz05cvl7a0/MSE%20-%20Guitar%20-%20Rhythmic%20Music%20Loops_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 40 guitar music loops in a single 120bpm tempo, total duration of about 30 minutes, including 9 music themes with acoustic guitar, 5 themes with bass guitar and 26 themes with electric guitar, supplemented by drums and percussion.


All tracks are mixed and mastered with careful use of equalization, compression and saturation.


Use loops as ready-made compositions for gameplay dynamic or calm scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


You can also divide all completed compositions into bars or beats, and to create ever-changing music and extra variation, you can start your beat from a new place each time. Don't be afraid to experiment.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 40 music loops
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • all tracks in 120bpm
  • 9 acoustic guitar themes
  • 5 bass guitar themes
  • 26 heavy guitar themes
  • great for dynamic or calm scenes and backgrounds
  • perfect for RPG, Adventure, Detective, Simulation, Arcade and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 40

Number of Audio Cues: 40

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes 56 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
